data.prayer: Jesus, provide a Bible for every believer in Masvingo, Zimbabwe, and teach them to obey it.
data.verse: For if you listen to the word and don’t obey, it is like glancing at your face in a mirror. 24 you see yourself, walk away, and forget what you look like. 25 But if you look carefully into the perfect law that sets you free, and if you do what it says and don’t forget what you heard, then God will bless you for doing it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Masvingo, Zimbabwe
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 374,548 believers in Masvingo, Zimbabwe a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 374,548 believers living in Masvingo, Zimbabwe.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Masvingo to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Masvingo, Zimbabwe.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Masvingo do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Masvingo to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
